Name: Water Bodies
Description: At least 60% of area is covered by permanent water bodies.

Name: Evergreen Needleleaf Vegetation
Description: Dominated by evergreen conifer trees and shrubs (>1m). Woody vegetation cover >10%.

Name: Evergreen Broadleaf Vegetation
Description: Dominated by evergreen broadleaf and palmate trees and shrubs (>1m). Woody vegetation cover >10%.

Name: Deciduous Needleleaf Vegetation
Description: Dominated by deciduous needleleaf (larch) trees and shrubs (>1m). Woody vegetation cover >10%.

Name: Deciduous Broadleaf Vegetation
Description: Dominated by deciduous broadleaf trees and shrubs (>1m). Woody vegetation cover >10%.

Name: Annual Broadleaf Vegetation
Description: Dominated by herbaceous annuals (<2m). At least 60% cultivated broadleaf crops.

Name: Annual Grass Vegetation
Description: Dominated by herbaceous annuals (<2m) including cereal croplands.

Name: Non-Vegetated Lands
Description: At least 60% of area is non-vegetated barren (sand, rock, soil) or permanent snow/ice with less than 10% vegetation.

Name: Urban and Built-up Lands
Description: At least 30% impervious surface area including building materials, asphalt, and vehicles.

Name: Unclassified
Description: Has not received a map label because of missing inputs.
